page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: Ruxley golf course,before it was built,was an apple orchard.It owns 60 acres.The other sports there are tennis ,squash,table tennis etc. The golf course was built in 1976,and is 9 years old. To join the course there is no waiting list you just buy a yearly membership or a daily one.The professional owns the pro shop. Cray valley before it was built was root land and orchard.Altogether it has 168 acres. The course is owned by a company called golf centres Ltd,which owns three other courses aswell. It was built in 1969 and opened two years later in 1971.They have a tournament every year in aid of the captains charity. Membership costs 25 pounds a year but for a day its 3 pounds.
